info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 8:36PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of west central Flathead County through 930 PM MST... At 835 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of West Glacier to 14 miles west of Whitefish. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Snowfall rates around one inch per hour are expected. Locations impacted include... Whitefish, Columbia Falls, Martin City, Coram, Olney, Lupfer, Hungry Horse and La Salle. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 125 and 151. Highway 93 between mile markers 117 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
